notes: nan
important_p: •    All MNP & new sales will get Jazz Champion’s by default •    Other package subscribers can migrate to Jazz Champions by dialing *337# •    Call set up fee Rs. 0.15 is applicable •    Actual internet speed will depend on multiple factors like sim, device, web pages accessed, time of day, number of simultaneous users, distance from 2G/3G/4G site etc •    If you are not subscribed to any data bundle, base rate will be charged i.e. Rs.5/MB. Charging Pulse will be 512 KB Customer can avail this bundle from our self-service channels i.e., 3111 Self-Service IVR.

notes: nan
important_p: Direct USSD:  *302# (string is disabled effective from 9th june, 2023) Package Conversion Charges: Rs. 15 + tax, Rs.17.95 (inc tax) Note: 1st time package plan conversion is free UPDATE: Please note that effective 14th March 2024 11:59PM below mentioned discounted voice payg rates will NOT be available for Jazz One service class. Normal call rates mentioned above (3.50/60 sec) will be charged to the customer. Customer having main account balance less than PKR 3.65 (Call base rate + Call setup charges) will not be able to intiate the call. Voice PayG Pilot (Starting from 12th Sep- Expired: 14th March 2024 11:59PM) We are conducting a pilot on Jazz One service class for discounted voice payg rates at balance less than Rs.3.65 . Customers having balance less than Rs.3.65 will be able to generate a new payg call and be charged based below banding for available balance. Current Balance PayG Rate Call Setup Total Deduction Min Max 3.15 3.64 2.70 0.15 2.85 2.65 3.14 2.20 0.15 2.35 2.15 2.64 1.70 0.15 1.85 1.65 2.14 1.20 0.15 1.35 1.15 1.64 0.70 0.15 0.85 Important Points: This is a pilot and will only be carried out on ‘Jazz One’ service class We are currently charging customers voice payg rate @ Rs.3.5 per min (Rs. 3.65 including call setup charge) These rates will only apply on new calls. In case of low balance, on-going call will disconnect, and customer will then be able to dial a new call at discounted rate. These rates will be applicable on both on-net & off-net Min however will not be applicable below Rs. 1.15 balance Rest of the existing mechanics will remain same

notes: Date: 2-July-2025 Gold Basic has been removed from Postpaid New Sale/Pre-Post Conversions as price and resources have been matched with Gold Value. Effective 2-July-2025, we will not offer Gold Basic(699) for Postpaid New Sale as well as for Pre to Post Conversion, instead, we can offer Gold Value or other available plans; 1- Gold Value 2- Gold Plus 3- Jazz Red 4- Jazz Red Z Offer Mechanics: All Price Plans are monthly recursive and pro-ratable; Maximum of 3 F&F numbers will be allowed; 4x Data Offer (For New Acquisition) will not be available for the New Price Plans. Important Points Gold Basic to Gold Classic Migration: 30k Customers on Gold Basic (PKR 750incl tax) will be migrated to Gold Classic (PKR 850 with additional 500 On Net Mins and 500 SMS) on 2nd Jun 2023. These customers have been sent a broadcast on 23rd May, the content of which is shared below: “Dear Customer, From 2-Jun-23, you will get 10GB, 3500 Onnet Min, 200 Offnet Min & 3500 SMS in only Rs.850 (Inc.Tax)/Month. Stay connected with Jazz Super 4G.” The customers calling on helpline before 1st Jun 2023 to revert their package will be excluded from Package Migration Activity. The customers calling between 1st Jun to 25th Jun 2023 will be reverted on Gold Basic on 2nd July 2023 and a credit note of PKR 100 will be posted to ensure positive customer experience The customers calling between 26th Jun to 25th July 2023 will be reverted on Gold Basic on 2nd Aug 2023 and a credit note of PKR 200 will be posted to ensure positive customer experience. Any customer requesting a package reversal after 25th July 2023 will not be entertained.

important_p: Prepaid Self Service Menu - *444# Prepaid consolidated Menu from where you can activated top desired bundles and services. Menu is attached for refrence. Main Menu 1: Top Offers Please refer to below tables 2: All in One Offers 3: Super 4G Data Offers 4: Super Social and SMS Offers 5: Make your own Offer Redirect to *303# 6: My Account Please refer to below tables 7: Prepaid Usage History Usage History (Calls, SMS and Data) Balance share History Recharge History 8: Jazz tunes Redirect to *230# 9: Jazz on WhatsApp 10: VAS Redirect to *6611# 11: Block on Stolen/Restoration 12: 4G Activation & Deactivation 13: International Roaming Redirect to *7626# Other Avaiable Services Personal info [Ownership Confirmation] My Package Plan and Balance Recharge Account Internet Settings Eligibility of Reactivation Offer Tax Certificate FNF List Improtant Point Please note that there may be a possible delay of ~30 minutes in displaying the Usage History.
